EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TUNISIA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD,
REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN VICINITY
35-56.00N 011-51.00E AT 241615Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
